title: Curse of the Viking Grave
description: The popular sequel to his award-winning Lost in the Barrens, this is Farley Mowatâ��s suspense-filled story of how Awasin, Jamie and Peetryuk, three adventure-prone boys, stumble upon a cache of Viking relics in an ancient tomb somewhere in the north of Canada.
